question: How can I apply for stockistship or dealership with R K Medicure?
answer: To become a stockist or PCD partner, simply fill out the Business Inquiry Form on our website or contact our distribution team at info@rkmedicure.com. We offer territory-wise exclusivity, attractive margins, and full marketing support across our female and pediatric product range.

question: How can a candidate apply for a job at R K Medicure?
answer: Interested in joining our team? You can explore current openings on our Careers page or send your resume to info@rkmedicure.com. We regularly recruit medical representatives, area managers, marketing executives, and back-office professionals passionate about healthcare.

question: Which areas does R K Medicure currently operate in?
answer: We have a south-India presence, actively operating across all major states and expanding into new markets through strong PCD networks and stockists. Our products are promoted by a growing field force and distributed through ethical, territory-based channels.

question: How can I place a bulk purchase order directly from the company?
answer: For bulk purchase inquiries — whether for hospitals, clinics, or institutional supply — please contact our sales team at info@rkmedicure.com. We offer special pricing, fast dispatch, and billing support for high-volume buyers.

question: How can I order or distribute R K Medicure products outside India?
answer: For export-related queries or international bulk purchases, reach out to our export division at info@rkmedicure.com. We follow all global regulatory norms and provide proper documentation (COA, MSDS, commercial invoice, etc.) to facilitate smooth overseas delivery.
